name: PALM TETRIS
description:
Palm Tetris is a puzzle game built on various cubes of different colors that need to be decomposed so as to fill the entire void.
For this you get points. The goal of the game is to get as many points as possible. There are difficulties in the game, the figures come in different colors, and when they fall, they change color to confuse you.

  • - Beautiful design
  • - Addictive gameplay
  • - Soothing music
  • - Replayability
